title: The Girls He Left Behind cinema slide
brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Girls He Left Behind’ featuring Alice Faye and Carmen Miranda distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.
